ItemTooltips.blink:
Great to initiate and escape!
Jump near low hp enemy then just use razes (qwe)
ItemTooltips.bottle: Provide hp and mp regen after you consume tangos, and great capability to gank, if can hit invis or haste just go and make some lane kill's!
ItemTooltips.travel_boots:
If you can farm it till min 10 get it. Help you gang faster/ push faster and move faster!

If not get it later in the game if you fight vs pushers like Nature Prophet.
ItemTooltips.power_treads:
Movement speed + atack speed + str / agilty or inteligence gain.
Keep them on str early in the game for more survabilty!
ItemTooltips.wraith_band:
Gain 3 str and like 9 dmg
Your base dmg is very low when game start, so get this first to make some lh!
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar:
Core item for Nevermore!

Get it afther lothar or dagger instead if you fight vs enemy with many disable.

Help you survive and ulty without beeing disabled!
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar:
Good vs heroes like Phantom Assasin or heroes who have butterfly.

You can't miss enemy's if you get this item.
ItemTooltips.butterfly:
Core item for almost any agilty carry.
Provide nice dmg and atack speed and help you survive even more with 35% chance to miss
ItemTooltips.greater_crit:
You can hit with +1000 critical dmg.

Should be enough to kill enemyes for 1-2 hits.

Works great with Desolator or Satanic!
ItemTooltips.manta:
Replace Shadow Blade or Blink in "end game" game cause it gives you nice stats for agilty hero like you are.

Most important +2 illusions who deal some dmg and can confuse your enemy!
ItemTooltips.invis_sword:
Get even more dmg and atack speed.

Use this with your ulty... focus on low hp heroes, like lion. Go invis above him then just cast ulty. It break's your invis after you cast ulty

Free kill!
ItemTooltips.satanic:
Very usefull vs str heroes in late game.

Help you survive. Activate it to steal even more hp.
ItemTooltips.helm_of_the_dominator:
Get this when you fight str heroes just to gain some hp when you hit.

Upgrade it later in Satanic!
ItemTooltips.desolator:
If fight versus low hp heroes , like many int or agilty go for this and kill them with 4-5 hits
-12 armor per hit and +60 dmg should be enough to own them!

AbilityTooltips.nevermore_shadowraze1:
900 line dmg at max level.

Max them after lvl 1 to burst 300 dmg instead.

Imba for killing heroes or creeps.
AbilityTooltips.nevermore_necromastery:
One of you base passives.
 Provide +72 dmg at max lvl, and you'r ulty is based on this skill.

Many souls mean big dmg ulty and big dmg per hit!
Max this and razes first.

Just max them as i suggest!
AbilityTooltips.nevermore_dark_lord: Max it afther lvl 9 to get -6 armor per hit witch mean more dmg per hit!
AbilityTooltips.nevermore_requiem:
You don't need ulty till lvl 9 cause it can't reach maxim potential till then.
You need 36 souls (lvl 4 necromastery) to relase full dmg with this, so at lvl 6 you can have maxim 20 souls!
